Alias.name: Forging Add Double
Alias.script: cecho("<red>\n "..matches[2].." "..matches[3].." "..matches[4].." "..matches[5].."'s added to forging order.") local count = tonumber(matches[2]) for i=1, count do table.insert(forge.next, matches[3].. " " ..matches[4].. " ".. matches[5]) forge.outrComms(matches[5], matches[3], matches[4]) end

Alias.name: Forging Stop
Alias.script: forge.next = {} cecho("<red>\nCleared forging order and will finish current item being forged.")

Alias.name: Start Forging
Alias.script: sendAll("outr coal", "put coal in forge", "fire forge", "forge for "..forge.next[1])

Alias.name: Forging Add Single
Alias.script: cecho("<red>\n "..matches[2].." "..matches[3].." "..matches[4].."'s added to forging order.") local count = tonumber(matches[2]) for i=1, count do table.insert(forge.next, matches[3].. " " ..matches[4]) forge.outrComms(matches[4], matches[3]) end

Alias.name: Forging Add none
Alias.script: cecho("<red>\n "..matches[2].." "..matches[3].."'s added to forging order.") local count = tonumber(matches[2]) for i=1, count do table.insert(forge.next, matches[3]) forge.outrComms(matches[3]) end
